::Shadow Wing::

She found the parts and the scanner she needed.  Now what to do with 
it, she thought.  She wondered if hooking it up to a CR chamber would 
do the trick.  She knew the CR restored the body and the DNA of a 
bot's aminal side.  She wondered if it could change a bot's form as 
well if the scanner was hooked up to it correctly.  She took the 
scanner and was about to walk out of the bay when the idea struck 
her. "Where am I going to find a wolf to scan?" She looked at the 
scanner and sighed.  The only wolf around that she knew of was 
Lunarpine.  "Well, so much for suprizing him.  I will need his help 
anyway in order to get this to work anyway."  She carried the scanner 
with her and walked back into the engine room.  She walked around the 
bend and still saw Lunarpine laying there.

"Um, I hate to bother you like this, but I need your help on a big 
project.  Would you be willing to help me?" She smiled. If this 
worked, she would be a wolf and he would be happier with life.  At 
least, that was her plan.
